name: Pretalx ‚Üí Pretix Speaker Pipeline
notes:
SETUP REQUIRED: Before activating this workflow, configure these values in n8n credentials and node settings:

1. PRETALX_CREDENTIAL_ID - Create HTTP Header Auth credential with pretalx API token
2. PRETIX_CREDENTIAL_ID - Create HTTP Header Auth credential with pretix API token
3. RESEND_CREDENTIAL_ID - Create HTTP Header Auth credential with Resend API key
4. STRAPI_CREDENTIAL_ID - Create HTTP Header Auth credential with Strapi API token
5. YOUR_ORGANIZER_SLUG - Replace in nodes: POST Create Pretix Order, POST Create Voucher 1/2, Code - Save Order Data, Code - Merge Vouchers
6. YOUR_EVENT_SLUG - Replace in same nodes as above
7. YOUR_SPEAKER_ITEM_ID - Pretix item ID for speaker tickets (POST Create Pretix Order)
8. YOUR_GUEST_ITEM_ID - Pretix item ID for guest vouchers (POST Create Voucher 1/2)
9. YOUR_TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID - Telegram group/channel ID for notifications
10. YOUR_BOT_TOKEN - Telegram bot token (or set in n8n credentials as telegramBotToken)
